pillars.title: Education & Leadership
pillars.summary: Transform education through innovative programs that build leadership capacity and global citizenship.
pillars.description: Our education pillar focuses on developing transformative learning experiences that prepare young people for the challenges of the 21st century. Through innovative curricula, leadership development programs, and global citizenship education, we're building a generation of change-makers.

programs.title: AI-Driven Career Guidance
programs.summary: Personalized career coaching using artificial intelligence to match skills with opportunities.

programs.title: Global Citizenship Education
programs.summary: Social-emotional learning and global citizenship clubs in schools.

programs.title: Youth Leadership Development
programs.summary: Comprehensive leadership training programs for emerging leaders.

pillars.title: Career Development
pillars.summary: AI-driven workforce development connecting talent with global opportunities.
pillars.description: We're revolutionizing career development through technology-enabled training programs, virtual assistance certification, and AI-powered job matching that connects African talent with global opportunities.

programs.title: Virtual Assistance Training
programs.summary: Comprehensive remote work skills training for the digital economy.

programs.title: AI Skills Matching
programs.summary: Machine learning algorithms that match candidates with optimal career paths.

programs.title: Entrepreneurship Support
programs.summary: Incubation and mentorship for social entrepreneurs.

pillars.title: Social Innovation & Policy
pillars.summary: Addressing health, climate justice, and systemic challenges through innovative solutions.
pillars.description: Our social innovation pillar tackles complex societal challenges through evidence-based interventions, policy advocacy, and community-driven solutions that create lasting impact.

programs.title: Mental Health Initiative
programs.summary: Psychosocial support and mental health awareness programs.

programs.title: Climate Justice Program
programs.summary: Environmental advocacy and climate adaptation initiatives.

programs.title: Policy Advocacy
programs.summary: Research-driven policy recommendations for systemic change.

pillars.title: Research & AI
pillars.summary: Smart monitoring, evaluation, and learning through advanced analytics and AI.
pillars.description: We leverage cutting-edge research methodologies and artificial intelligence to generate insights that drive evidence-based decision making and continuous improvement across all our programs.

programs.title: Workforce Analytics
programs.summary: AI-powered labor market insights and trend analysis.

programs.title: Smart MEL Systems
programs.summary: Advanced monitoring, evaluation, and learning frameworks.

programs.title: Research Innovation Lab
programs.summary: Cutting-edge research on development challenges and solutions.

impactStories.title: From Student to Global VA
impactStories.body: Sarah transformed her life through our VA training program, now earning $1,200/month working with international clients while supporting her family and community.

impactStories.title: Climate Action in Rural Communities
impactStories.body: Our climate justice program helped 15 rural communities implement sustainable farming practices, increasing crop yields by 40% while reducing environmental impact.

impactStories.title: Mental Health Breakthrough
impactStories.body: Through our mental health initiative, we've trained 200+ community health workers, reaching over 10,000 individuals with psychosocial support services.
